1.content:
Feeling nauseous with a mild headache similar the the feeling of a blackout you open your eyes and try to recall events prior and make sense of your surroundings. The only thing you can make sense of is the room around you looks enormous. No it's not enormous your just smaller. Much smaller. Maybe a little smaller then an inch tall

Where are you?
1.title: You awaken feeling disoriented
